info.name: Material Dark Gmail
info.description: A Material version of Gmail. Based on Jetbrains Material theme. 3 themes available : Oceanic, Darker, Palenight If your eyes like it, I did the same on some other well-known websites with the same theme: https://userstyles.org/users/763420
info.additionalInfo:
IMPORTANT: For a better experience, you have to select "Dark theme" in Gmail Settings > Themes > Dark

Most of the code is from the great work of EvHaus (https://github.com/EvHaus/google-redesigned/)
